catalog_info.title: Introduction to Catalan
catalog_info.notes:
Conducted in Catalan. Knowledge of another Romance language is useful but not essential. Not open to auditors. May not be taken Pass/Fail, but may be taken Sat/Unsat by GSAS students.
This course is taught by members of the Department.
